script.duplicate_installation: The ClothCalc UserScript has been installed twice, with two different languages. You should disable one of the two languages for the UserScript to work properly.
script.script_description: The ClothCalc UserScript is a project created by the TW-DB.info team. It offers many features and extensions that will give you an improved gaming experience - saving your time and optimizing some of your activities.
script.paypal_alt: PayPal - The safest and easiest way to pay online!
script.api_registration_failed: Registration of the TW-DB.info UserScript with TheWestApi failed.

settings.collector_text: Mark items in Trader and Market that you don't have in your inventory yet
settings.collector_sell_text: Add a button to sell all except one selected item in the Trader
settings.pin_items_text: Pin items in the Inventory window
settings.instant_quest_text: Complete a quest directly if all requirements are met
settings.colored_quest_text: Change the color of quests that can be completed
settings.job_show_lp_text: Add Labor Points to job windows
settings.task_list_points_text: Add Labor Points indicator and health points tips to Task List - [Bottom right]
settings.import_westforts_text: Add fort battle import button from site (westforts)
settings.enhanced_fort_recruitment_text: Enhance Recruitment tab before fort battle
settings.declare_report_text: Link battle axe unearthing report to the specific attack fort
settings.cemetery_critical_text: Critical hits and Ghost Rounds in fort cemetery
settings.total_dmg_battle_text: Total damage dealt in each player's description during fort battle
settings.battle_info_round_text: Accurate hits, missed shots, hits taken and shot dodges per round
settings.building_progress_text: Show construction progress in a building window
settings.church_levels_text: Show additional church levels you can build
settings.improved_ch_tab_text: Show only buildings that are not fully constructed
settings.town_forum_blink_text: Remove Town button blinking if there is a new message in Town Forum
settings.market_reminder_text: Add a reminder for Market auctions
settings.market_sell_dialog_text: Enhance the sell window in Market
settings.market_report_text: Enhance the Report icon for sale in Market
settings.improved_market_text: Enhance the buy window in Market
settings.duel_motivation_text: Add a permanent indicator for Duel Motivation - [Below Energy indicator]
settings.direct_sleep_text: Add a button for direct transition to Hotel or Barracks
settings.deposit_text: Add a button for Money Deposit at the Bank you are at
settings.exp_bar_text: Add values to Experience Bar - Credits and thanks to (Leones/Slygoxx/Belle Bernice)
settings.mini_chat_gui_text: Add a button to minimize Chat Rooms
settings.custom_event_counter_text: Move event counter on large screens (Event Coin, Hiro&#39;s script)
settings.no_scrollbars_text: Disable scrollbars on small screens or when moving windows too far
settings.close_all_wear_text: Add a button to automatically close only Inventory windows
settings.profile_duel_exp_text: Show duel experience in player profiles
settings.regen_timers_text: Add regeneration timers to player portrait
settings.button_church_text: Add a button for easier opening of Church building window
settings.button_market_text: Add a button for easier opening of Market window
settings.show_bonus_jobs_text: Add option to show bonus jobs
settings.show_coordinates_text: Add option to move to specified coordinates
settings.no_work_queue_pa_text: Disable notifications for Premium Automation purchase
settings.no_fetch_all_pa_text: Disable Premium prompt when receiving items from market
settings.no_wof_nuggets_text: Disable Nuggets as default payment method in events (when available)
settings.auto_deposit_text: Add notification for deposit if you arrive in your town with money
settings.chest_analyser_text: Add Chest Analyser to Telegram/Reports window
settings.weekly_crafting_text: Add notification for crafting waiting period expiration
settings.telegram_bb_codes_text: Add a button to change to unformatted text in telegrams
settings.enhanced_rankings_text: Enhance Ranking tabs and add player difference
settings.pin_important_el_text: Keep Menu, Experience and script line always at the top
settings.night_mode_text: Dark Theme mode for The-West map
settings.improved_whisper_text: Enhance Whisper sound in various Saloon chats (While the setting is enabled, you can listen and change the sound directly from the list below)

importExport.import_error: Error importing settings. Check if the text is valid JSON.
